name: Super Neon Battle - Early Access
description:
If you don't like your friends, simply jump on their head!

Super Neon Battle is a local multiplayer action platformer.

Beat your friends in battle by jumping on their heads and kicking them down the deadly pit! Dodge lasers, jump from walls, and collect the power-up as you dart your way through the ever-moving arena!

Controls

Keyboard

  • W / Up: Jump / Wall-jump
  • A / Left: Move left
  • D / Right: Move right
  • S  / Down: Emote
  • P / Escape: Pause Game

Controller

  • Left analog stick: Move left / right
  • Bottom Face Button: Jump / Wall-jump
  • Right Face Button: Emote
  • Start: Pause Game
